name: Wacky Cultists
description:
The game was made as a subject for a 3D Programming class, the objective was to draw 5 random cards from the board game Munchkin and make a game using them and the learned concepts from the class (Materials, Shader ,Lighting, etc).

The cards were:

-Cure the insanity from the cultists with a wack on their heads;

-Practice Aim;

-Sink;

-Two-Handed Flashlight;

-Bowling Pin.

The assets used were:

-Post Processing Stack;

-ProBuilder;
